channel.title: Post here if you want but i found out how todo this
channel.description:
Well im new to this kind of stuff and i was wanting to know how to add the items such as the new barrows armour in this post. http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,360193.0.html
Well i have downloaded it and i want to know where to put it and stuff im pretty sure you have to put it in the [b]model[/b] folder and stuff but i dont know what to do after that like theres something todo with the [b]class.8[/b] file but i dont know what to place in it and stuff.
Im not sure how to do anything after [i]downloading[/i] it.
[b]If anyone could help out a first time item designer THANKS.[/b]
[b]I HAD HELP ALREADY BUT POST HERE IF YOU WANT TO[/b]
